article.headline: Oregon State 70, Northern Colorado 52
article.story: CORVALLIS, Ore. (AP) -- Chris Stephens had 17 points and three assists to lead Oregon State to a 70-52 win against Northern Colorado at Gill Coliseum on Wednesday night. Sasa Cuic and Kyle Jefferson each added 13 points and five rebounds for Oregon State (3-3). Kirk Archibeque had 10 points and seven rebounds to lead Northern Colorado(0-11), a Division I independent. The Beavers used a 15-2 run to jump out to a 17-4 lead, and scored 12 straight points later in the half. Oregon State had three players -- Sasa Cuic, Kyle Jeffers and Stephens -- with eight points or more in the first half and led 39-18 at halftime. Oregon State led by as many as 28 in the second half, while Northern Colorado got within 14. The Beavers forced Northern Colorado into 11 turnovers in the first half and 19 for the game.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
